# IDictionaryTypeConverter.Accepts method

Check if the type is IDictionary

```csharp
public bool Accepts(Type type)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| type | The type to check |

## Return Value

true if the type is IDictionary; otherwise, false.
